<details>
<summary>{{school_data$School}}</summary>

<br>
<div class = "row">
<div class = "col-md-5">
<img src="{{school_data$Image}}" style="max-width:200px;width:100%">
</div>
<div class = "col-md-7">
<p><strong>School:</strong> {{school_data$BusinessSchool}}<br>
<strong>Ranking: </strong>#{{school_data$Ranking}}<br>
<strong>Location: </strong>{{school_data$Location}}<br>
<strong>Cost (Out-of-State): </strong>{{school_data$OutOfStateTuition}}<br>
<strong>Credits: </strong>{{school_data$Credits}}</p>
</div>
</div>

<div class = "row">
<div class = "col-md-12">
<p>{{school_data$Text}}</p>
<a href="{{school_data$Link}}" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">{{school_data$LinkName}}</a>
</div>
</div>


<hr>
</details>
